properties.name: _Michigan Territory
properties.note:
Michigan Territory (1816-12-11)

1816/12/11 -> 1818/12/02

The state of Indiana was created from Indiana Territory and small parts of Illinois and Michigan Territories.

(U.S. Stat., vol. 3, ch. 57 [1816], secs. 1-2/p. 289, and res. 1 [1816]/p. 399; Van Zandt, 115)
